title: Hey Riot, punish me more
body:
For dodging ARAM games because I don't want to play with a bot on my team. Or 2 bots, or more.

If I can pick them in champ select how the **** do you lot have so much trouble finding them?

replies.body: Leaving a game is a no go. They ban bots in waves, so it wouldn't happen the moment you report. 2 wrongs don't make a right

> [{quoted}](name=Astara,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=Avppnv6F,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-02T07:17:39.659+0000)
>
> Leaving a game is a no go. They ban bots in waves, so it wouldn't happen the moment you report. 2 wrongs don't make a right

Hahaha ye no. Obvious bots on my team I'm leaving. I'm in the wrong? Ye ok lol.

Like it or not, you queue up, you play. That is what you signed up for when you made an account. Why are you so focused on other players? Do you only have fun playing when everything is perfect? Because if so, this is not the game for you. Any PvP game would also not be for you. I'm not saying botting is ok. I'm saying that you SHOULD get punished for afking games. Regardless of other people doing whatever.

Because if so, this is not the game for you. Any PvP game would also not be for you. I'm not saying botting is ok. I'm saying that you SHOULD get punished for afking games. Regardless of other people doing whatever.

Sigh. I didn't afk, it states pretty clearly I dodged.

'Like it or not, you queue up, you play.' Does not state that anywhere in ToS. It's a game not a contract. 

'So focused on other players'.. Because you know me so well. ** Did not even mention other players**, only bots. Yes I like other players on my team, not bots, as most people do.

'Do you only have fun playing when everything is perfect?' Because you know me so well. I don't need 'perfect' to have fun, just a full team of human players. Playing with bots on your team is fun for you? 

'PVP games may not be for me'  Because I don't want to play a game full of bots? Lmao!

So you throw a fit and walk away. Great! I guess the rest of your team mate that've reported you, their frustration mean nothing. This is all about how you feel and what you want.

You did something wrong, you got punished for it. Be a man about it. If you think it wasnt justify THEN TELL ME WHY. If you were on my team, and you afk;  YOU CAN BET YOUR BOTTOM DOLLAR ILL REPORT YOU, IN HOPE OF GETTING YOU BANNED.

Sigh.** Please read the post before you respond**. Especially if you're going to respond with caps lock on...

No-one reported me because as the opening post clearly states; I dodged. I didn't AFK, I dodged. 

If anything I bet my team mates thanked me, me dodging meant they didn't have to play with a bot either.

Embarassing.

Your arguement is because you dont want to play with the so called bot "What is the tell of who is a bot without playing with? please share". You justified your cause by saying "why did i get punished for dodging".  and further it by saying "in the TOS there is no punishment for dodging", Am sure the consequences of dodging 'such as time delay', is cleared and **have been put in place due to dodge abuse. **

>Please read the post before you respond

Well sorry. I've confused between your dodging to those that afk and then give reasons such and such; As to why the punishment should be lifted. Same thought process; Unable to comprehend the rules that was set up, to your own personal desire. 

The bottom line for my retort is the same. what you did goes agaisnt the rule, got punished by the enforced law. Be a man about it, it's not that long a duration to wait it out.
